channel.title: Looking for a server with these
channel.description:
I have been serching all over for a server that meets my criteria and have had bad luck. Here is what I am looking for:
Donators do not get advantages over non donators. Just cosmetic if anything
Fully working construction and able to start said skill
100x or more xp rate
No SOF
A working webclient (I do not want to download a client)
No double xp/item drop/ect for the weekends
Not a pk server (can have a pking area, just not most of the server)
No gambling
No pk ranks
Does not glitch when you click on equipment stats (seems to be a common problem with servers I try)
Shops have correct prices displayed both below the icon and when clicking info/value
No vote for rewards
No forcing players to vote
No account resets
If you do not like this topic, then please leave. I seem to attract a lot of posters who make comments that are off topic.

item.title: Looking for a server with these
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Server does not exist. Also this belongs in the download request section

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a server with these
